data.query: { rows: instances(top:5, filters: [[["inbox_users", "=", "{userId}"],"or",["cc_users", "=", "{userId}"]], ["category_name","=","合同管理"]], sort: "modified desc") {  _id, name, category_name, flow_name, submitter_name,modified, values }}
